Hymn.Arabic: أَذْكُرْ يَا رَبُّ رَأْفَاتِكَ وَمَرَاحِمَكَ ، فَإِنَّهَا ثَابِتَةٌ مُنذُ الأَزلِ،
Hymn.English: 6 Remember, O Lord, Your tender mercies and Your lovingkindnesses, For they are from of old.

Hymn.Arabic: خَطَايَا صِبَايَ ، وَجَهَالَاتِي فَلَا تَذْكُرُهَا. هَلِّلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 7 Do not remember the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions.     Alleluia
